item.title: CVE-2022-40635|2024-08-03T12:21:46.555Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Improper Control of Dynamically-Managed Code Resources vulnerability in Crafter Studio of Crafter CMS allows authenticated developers to execute OS commands via Groovy Sandbox Bypass.

item.title: CVE-2022-40634|2024-08-03T12:21:46.586Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Improper Control of Dynamically-Managed Code Resources vulnerability in Crafter Studio of Crafter CMS allows authenticated developers to execute OS commands via FreeMarker SSTI.
